text: Balanacan Port () is the major port in the island province of Marinduque, Philippines. It is located at the north-western tip of the province in Barangay Balanacan at the town of Mogpog. ==Port Administration== The port is managed by the Philippine Ports Authority. The main shipping lines operating are Montenegro Shipping Lines and Starhorse Shipping Lines. Routes are mainly to and from Dalahican, Quezon. ==References== Category:Ports and harbors of the Philippines Category:Buildings and structures in Marinduque Category:Transportation in Luzon
title: Port of Balanacan
